data.title: 10 Best Performing S&P 500 Stocks Of The Decade
data.text: The 2010s was an exceptional decade on Wall Street no matter how you look at it. Not only was there no economic recession or bear market at any point in the decade, the S&P 500 nearly tripled throughout the 2010s, gaining 190% and making new all-time highs.

data.title: GroupM predicts 2020 will have slow growth in digital ad spending
data.text: Brian Wieser, GroupM Global President, and Mike Jackson, 2050 marketing founder, join 'Squawk Alley' to discuss the future of digital ads.

data.title: Amazon will break ground on HQ2 soon — here's what it will look like
data.text: Amazon expects to begin building HQ2, which includes two high-rise towers, green spaces and retail stores, by early 2020.

data.title: Why One Analyst Thinks 2020 Could Be Huge for Amazon
data.text: Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) has been the dominant market force with more and more people turning to online commerce, which has been especially evident this holiday season.

data.title: Tech giants have big ambitions in health, but do best when they stick to what they know
data.text: It's been about 10 years since the biggest tech companies started moving into health.

data.title: Slowing AWS Revenue Growth Is Dragging Amazon Stock Down
data.text:
Amazon Web Services growth has been slowing, and for the first time fell below the 10% year-over-year growth mark in the third quarter.
